theDuelist:SummonPower.NAME: Summons
DESCRIPTIONS: monsters summoned. Play monsters cards to stack more #ysummons, or #yTribute to remove stacks. Cannot stack over 5 or below 0.

theDuelist:DespairPower.NAME: Axe of Despair
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, lose 10 #yStrength, #yTribute 1 and place Axe of Despair on the top of your deck.

theDuelist:JamPower.NAME: Jam Breeder
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Summon #b

theDuelist:SpellCounterPower.NAME: Spell Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: No inherent effect. Play magic monster cards to activate.
